# Preface {-}

This document includes a series of Great Salt Lake salinity and elevation analyses for discussion with the Great Salt Lake Salinity Advisory Committee. The figures generated in this document 
are intended for inclusion in a Great Salt Lake salinity dashboard. All data are drawn from [USGS NWIS](https://waterdata.usgs.gov/nwis).
